title: Perfect Superstar - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Devoted Love Interests   Dreams   Famous Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Late Romance   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Movies   Music   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Parallel Worlds   Poor to Rich   Popular Love Interests   Power Couple   Showbiz   Singers   Special Abilities   Tragic Past   Transplanted Memories   Weak to Strong   Writers
author: Chen Ru Tai Ping Yang
description: Lu Chen had a dream, an incredibly long dream.. The dream world was familiar yet at the same time unfamiliar. Singer, actor, freelance writer, he actually went through three sections of different lives in a dream world! When he woke up, Lu Chen thus embarked on a bright road of becoming a perfect superstar!>
